G3_build_succeeds.notes: `npm run build` fails on TypeScript import resolution in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`, but fallback `npm run dev` starts successfully and serves the app shell.

G7_normalization_logic_exists.notes: Normalization function multiplies 0-10 scores by 10 in `scripts/governance.js:189-192`.

G9_chart_renders_data.notes: Scatter component maps project points from `data` prop in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:132-141`.

G10_tooltips_implemented.notes: Custom tooltip wired into chart via `<Tooltip content={<CustomTooltip />}>` in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:128-130`.

A1_data_population.evidence: Uses the 4 seeded files in `_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:1`, `_content/projects/PRJ-002.md:1`, `_content/projects/PRJ-003.md:1`, `_content/projects/PRJ-004.md:1` and processes them in `scripts/governance.js:249-313`.
A1_data_population.notes: Meets baseline seeded dataset usage without additional project coverage.

A2_score_normalization.evidence: Dedicated normalization helper in `scripts/governance.js:189-192`; consumed by matrix transform in `scripts/governance.js:208-213`.
A2_score_normalization.notes: Correct normalization and clearly separated from chart rendering.

A3_quadrant_assignment.evidence: Quadrant assignment isolated in `getQuadrant` utility (`scripts/governance.js:194-202`) with explicit 50-threshold logic.
A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Implementation quality is solid and separated from JSX.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.evidence: Chart implementation exists in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:88-143` with proper axes, but build-time type failure (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`) prevents a stable production render.
A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Chart is implemented with correct axes/labels and observable in dev mode; build failure is scored in technical foundation instead of cascading here.

A5_tooltip_implementation.evidence: Tooltip content includes title and quadrant (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:46-63`), status/owner/ROI (`:64-72`), but matrix module fails type-check in build (`:3`).
A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Tooltip content and formatting are implemented and verifiable in dev mode; build stability penalty is isolated elsewhere.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Pipeline is separated into governance transform script (`scripts/governance.js:315-343`), generated data artifact (`public/master_data.json:140-189`), route-level fetch/filter (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:41-71`), and rendering component (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:86-174`).
A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Good matrix pipeline separation despite type-contract mismatch between components.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: The candidate implemented the matrix pipeline and UI with correct logic, but a TypeScript module mismatch materially degrades deliverability.

B1_project_setup.evidence: Project has Next.js/TypeScript scripts (`package.json:6-12`) and strict mode (`tsconfig.json:7`), but production build fails with unresolved import in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`.
B1_project_setup.notes: Configuration is present but not build-clean.

B2_routing_navigation.evidence: Routes implemented at `/` and `/matrix` (`src/app/page.tsx:4`, `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:35`), while nav links to unimplemented `/projects` and optional `/timeline` (`src/app/layout.tsx:33-37`).
B2_routing_navigation.notes: Basic navigation between implemented routes exists (/ and /matrix), though nav also includes unimplemented targets.

B3_type_safety.evidence: TypeScript is used, but there is unresolved import `@/lib/projects` (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`) and explicit `any` usage in tooltip props (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:41`).
B3_type_safety.notes: Type system is present but not consistently enforced.

B4_data_layer.evidence: Structured data pipeline reads markdown with gray-matter (`scripts/governance.js:16`, `:273`), validates with Zod (`:45-58`, `:277-295`), and emits consolidated `master_data.json` (`:315-343`).
B4_data_layer.notes: Strong data-layer design centered on build-time governance processing.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Data-layer engineering is solid, but routing and type/build stability are notably weak.

C1_visual_design.evidence: Dashboard and matrix use cohesive Tailwind card/layout patterns (`src/app/page.tsx:31-101`, `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:79-142`) and custom tooltip styling (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:45-80`).
C1_visual_design.notes: Clean and functional but not highly differentiated/premium.

C2_responsive_design.evidence: Responsive grid classes used in dashboard (`src/app/page.tsx:31`, `:51`) and filters (`src/app/matrix/MatrixFilters.tsx:56`), plus responsive chart container (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:88`).

C3_interactivity.evidence: Interactive filtering and tooltip behavior are implemented (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:68-76`, `src/app/matrix/MatrixFilters.tsx:22-36`, `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:128-130`), but matrix module compile error (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`) undermines reliability.
C3_interactivity.notes: Filtering and tooltip interactions are functional in dev mode; polish depth is moderate.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.evidence: Basic loading state shown before data fetch completes (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:54-60`); no explicit error-state handling for failed fetch/invalid JSON.
C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Minimum loading coverage exists; error handling is limited.

C5_design_token_usage.evidence: Design tokens exist in `_content/config.json`, but visual styling uses hardcoded palette/classes in `src/app/page.tsx:26-47`, `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:24-38`, and `src/app/globals.css:5-19` without config-driven color/typography application.
C5_design_token_usage.notes: No effective tenant token integration in the rendered UI layer.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: UI is serviceable with some interaction and responsive patterns, but polish and token-based theming are limited.

D1_schema_adherence.evidence: PRD-shaped frontmatter present in project files (e.g., `_content/projects/PRJ-001.md:2-22`) and enforced with Zod validation (`scripts/governance.js:45-58`, `:277-295`).
D1_schema_adherence.notes: Strong schema compliance with programmatic enforcement.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.evidence: Threshold logic exactly matches PRD in `scripts/governance.js:194-202`, producing canonical placements in `public/master_data.json:140-189` (Quick Wins/Big Bets/Fillers/Time Sinks). Quadrant labels are rendered in `src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:146-157`.
D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Quadrant logic and labeling are accurate and explicit.

D3_route_structure.evidence: Implements `/` and `/matrix` routes (`src/app/page.tsx:4`, `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:35`), but `/roadmap`, `/projects`, and `/projects/[slug]` are not implemented.

D4_specification_details.evidence: Scatter chart used (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:89`), X-axis mapped to effort/complexity (`:99-107`), Y-axis mapped to strategic value/impact (`:114-122`), and Quick Wins label placed in top-left quadrant overlay (`:146-148`).
D4_specification_details.notes: Core matrix specification details are implemented correctly.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: PRD logic fidelity for matrix math and schema is strong, with only partial route-coverage gaps.

E1_separation_of_concerns.evidence: Overall architecture separates concerns: layout/navigation (`src/app/layout.tsx:25-42`), dashboard view (`src/app/page.tsx:23-101`), matrix page orchestration (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:35-143`), chart rendering (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:86-174`), and governance/data pipeline (`scripts/governance.js:249-343`).
E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Modular organization is clear at project level.

E2_readability_naming.evidence: Readable function names and variable semantics in governance and matrix modules (e.g., `normalizeScore`, `getQuadrant`, `calculateMatrixData` in `scripts/governance.js:189-220`; `selectedDepartments`/`filteredData` in `src/app/matrix/page.tsx:37-71`).
E2_readability_naming.notes: Code is generally easy to follow.

E3_error_handling.evidence: Governance pipeline fails fast with explicit validation errors (`scripts/governance.js:157-161`, `:172-183`, `:305-309`), but client fetch in matrix page has no catch/fallback (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:41-51`).
E3_error_handling.notes: Good build-time validation, limited runtime resilience in UI.

E4_dependency_choices.evidence: Appropriate core dependencies for requirements: `recharts`, `gray-matter`, `zod` (`package.json:17-20`), plus optional ingestion stack in `scripts/ingest.js:6-8`.
E4_dependency_choices.notes: Dependency set is relevant and mostly justified for implemented scope.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Code organization and readability are solid, but runtime robustness and type-contract consistency need work.

F1_dashboard.evidence: Dashboard includes multiple computed widgets (Total Investment, ROI Multiplier, Active Projects, Completion Rate) in `src/app/page.tsx:31-47` and phase/activity sections in `:51-95`, derived from `master_data.json` (`:15-21`).
F1_dashboard.notes: Meaningful bonus dashboard beyond matrix minimum.

F2_additional_pages.evidence: Only one additional implemented route beyond `/matrix`: dashboard `/` (`src/app/page.tsx:4`).

F3_search_filtering.evidence: Functional multi-dimension filtering on matrix by department and status (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:68-71`, `src/app/matrix/MatrixFilters.tsx:22-36`).
F3_search_filtering.notes: Good filtering controls, but no delivered fuzzy-search experience despite Fuse dependency.

F4_creative_additions.evidence: Added AI ingestion prototype script for transcript-to-project draft generation (`scripts/ingest.js:56-111`, `:165-225`).
F4_creative_additions.notes: AI ingestion prototype is a meaningful creative addition beyond baseline requirements.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Dashboard and ingestion prototype provide useful bonus scope, but breadth across app pages/features is moderate.

G1_prioritization.evidence: Candidate prioritized core matrix and dashboard work (`src/app/matrix/page.tsx:35-143`, `src/app/page.tsx:23-101`), but left a blocking matrix build/type issue unresolved (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`).
G1_prioritization.notes: Must-have matrix and dashboard were prioritized and function in dev mode, but production build quality control was incomplete.

G2_pr_description.evidence: No submission-specific implementation summary found; `README.md:1-73` remains the assessment prompt text.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Some prioritization signal exists from implemented scope, but communication and final stabilization are weak.

H1_commit_cadence.evidence: History shows 7 commits with incremental progression: `init`, `somemore`, `ingest this`, `revamp governace function`, `new filtering`, `executive dashboard`.
H1_commit_cadence.notes: Good commit cadence for a time-boxed assessment.

H2_message_quality.evidence: Most commit messages are vague or non-descriptive (`somemore`, `init`, `ingest this`).
H2_message_quality.notes: Message quality is below professional standard.

H3_logical_progression.evidence: Commit sequence indicates staged development from setup to governance/filtering/dashboard features.
H3_logical_progression.notes: Logical progression is visible despite weak message quality.

top_strengths: Governance/data pipeline is substantial: markdown ingestion, Zod validation, taxonomy/date checks, normalization, quadrant assignment, and generated aggregate artifact (`scripts/governance.js:27-343`).
Matrix math and quadrant placement are correct and align with seeded truth, including normalized values in `public/master_data.json:140-189` and 50-threshold logic in `scripts/governance.js:194-202`.
Candidate delivered a meaningful executive dashboard with computed portfolio metrics (`src/app/page.tsx:15-47`) and phase indicator content (`src/app/page.tsx:51-84`).
top_weaknesses: Production build is broken by unresolved type import (`src/app/matrix/StrategyMatrix.tsx:3`), which is a major quality/stability gap.
Route coverage is partial and navigation contains dead links (`src/app/layout.tsx:33-37`) for unimplemented pages.
Submission communication is missing; no implementation summary or rationale was added (`README.md:1-73`).
standout_moments: AI ingestion prototype (`scripts/ingest.js`) goes beyond baseline requirements and shows product-thinking ambition, even though it is not integrated into app routes.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This candidate demonstrates good data/governance engineering and correct matrix business logic, with functional matrix interactions in dev mode. The key delivery risk is production readiness discipline: unresolved build/type issues and partial route completion. They look promising for execution with stronger QA/CI guardrails.
